protein.specific_function: Buffers cytosolic calcium. May stimulate a membrane Ca(2+)-ATPase and a 3',5'-cyclic nucleotide phosphodiesterase

reference.reference_text: Parmentier M, Lawson DE, Vassart G: Human 27-kDa calbindin complementary DNA sequence. Evolutionary and functional implications. Eur J Biochem. 1987 Dec 30;170(1-2):207-15.
